adoption_alert_body: The adoption platform is made with love for all animal lovers in Saudi Arabia. With the purpose of adopting any animal on the platform or adding any animal for adoption, please note that we, Alefak Cooperative, are not responsible at all for any agreements or financial transactions or otherwise between any parties, and the platform is free for everyone.
add_animal_alert_body: It is not permissible to add names or phrases that are not suitable for an animal adoption platform, and it is not permissible to add a human voice or any image that is not suitable for an animal adoption platform or any images that contradict our religion and traditions.
